name: Roasted Bell Peppers with Sunflower Seeds
author: EC
summary: A great starter for any dinner that's quick and easy. Rosemary adds an aromatic flavor to the bell peppers, and the sunflower seeds add to the texture of the dish.
ingredients: 2  yellow bell peppers, halved and seeded
2  red bell peppers, halved and seeded
directions: Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil
In a skillet over medium heat, cook the sunflower seeds 5 minutes, stirring constantly, until lightly toasted
Place the pepper halves cut side down on the baking sheet
In a bowl, mix the olive oil, lime juice, balsamic vinegar, rosemary, salt, and pepper
Brush peppers with the olive oil mixture
Roast peppers under the broiler 5 minutes, or until slightly charred
Remove from heat, peel, and slice
Toss with the toasted sunflower seeds to serve
